__e: I spent so much time wanting you back that, when I thought that you wanted me back, it's like I lost my mind for a second.

But if there's just even the slightest little chance that you could go back with her and make her happy, well, then it doesn't matter, because all that matters to me is that you make her happy and that she be happy.
I'm just supposed to believe you when all of a sudden you come back to me, and you tell me you want to make it work?
